ActOfficial Residences Act
SubjectSarah Clarke ** Appointment **
PrecisOrder (1) Appointing SARAH CLARKE, Special Assistant at the Prime Minister's residence; and (2) fixing her remuneration and conditions of employment, effective July 21, 2021.
AttachmentsAttachment
